comments:
Description:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when use -1 as first argument in IContent.setExtension method.

Steps to reproduce:
IContent content = new ContainerContent( new ReportContent( ) );
content.setExtension( -1, "invalid" );

Expected result:
assert error or ignored.

Actual result:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1

Error logs:
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.content.impl.AbstractContent.setExtension(AbstractContent.java:429)

add an javadoc to this API to describe that only two constants are supported now.

Add JavaDoc on it and an Exception will be thrown if BIRT user input invalid extension type.

Fixed.
